name: Prairie Dog Simulator
description:
Welcome to Prairie Dog Simulator!

This was completed within a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1.

The goal is to eat all the grass to win. If the coyote kills all your prairie dogs you lose.
The prairie dogs will go eat grass and hide in their holes if a predator comes too close. The player can create more prairie dogs or create more holes to allow the prairie dogs to spread out further safely.

Controls:
The camera can be moved with W,A,S,D keys. 
Zoom in with mouse wheel.Rotated with the Q,E keys
